Text:
Thanks for sharing this m8.
Brings back memories. The bare essentials of an image viewer.
I will try and keep this going.
I agree.  I too will keep this going. Thanks.
the last good version of an awesome image viewer

Perfect version. All versions since are gradually able to cope with various video formats, junk features, as well as photo manipulation. If I want to perform advanced tasks, I'll just use PhotoShop for that, thank you. 

I want my ACDSee to just open pictures really fast any have a few mouse functions. This is truly the last perfect version of ACDSee. 

I will join in on the seeding of this torrent.

Thanks to Mmx64 for this.
You're a lifesaver, thank you soooo much!
